title: The Restless Earth
creator_credit: BBC, ABC-TV (Australia), National Educational Television, Studio Hamburg and Sverides Radio Sweeden
brief_description: Looks at the earth’s geological history in terms of the ”plate theory”, with particular reference to Britain. Discusses the movement of the plates carrying the continents, the formation of oceans and mountains, and the occurrence of earthquakes and volcanoes. Introduced by Magnus Magnusson and narrated by John Gregson. (This is the Australian version with Australians - Peter Ross and Keith Michell- as host and narrator).
